text:
Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,tarsal-carpal coalition syndrome
What is (are) carbamoyl phosphate synthetase I deficiency ?,"Carbamoyl phosphate synthetase I deficiency is an inherited disorder that causes ammonia to accumulate in the blood (hyperammonemia). Ammonia, which is formed when proteins are broken down in the body, is toxic if the levels become too high. The brain is especially sensitive to the effects of excess ammonia.
